amendment.description: An amendment to provide that total project costs in section 902 of the Water Resources Developement Act of 1986 shall not apply with respect to any project that receives funds made available by title I of this Act.

action.text: Mr. Simpson raised a point of order against the Cleaver amendment (A041). Mr. Simpson stated that the amendment sought to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Cleaver.
